approximately 1.2 million people die on

u.s. suggested that more than 90% of
fatalities were a result of human error
take us humans out of the equation and
those figures will drop considerably not
only that but the computer-like

the problem is with different

detect the ever-changing world around

a real-time simulation that the cars
brain can plan a course through doing it
this way is allowing German cars to
speed along stretches of the Autobahn at
more than 100 kilometers an hour
seamlessly overtaking and merging with

difference between the German cars are

the humans inside instinctively put
